docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v1 is deprecated. Please use v2. If you still need to use v1, you may do so by either passing ‘version=1’ in the Accept Header or using api/v1/ in the URL.

methods.name: destroy

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

examples:
DELETE /api/hostgroups/928644286-hostgroup2
200
{
  "hostgroup": {
    "id": 928644286,
    "name": "hostgroup2",
    "created_at": "2016-03-10T15:51:29.713Z",
    "updated_at": "2016-03-10T15:51:29.713Z",
    "environment_id": null,
    "operatingsystem_id": null,
    "architecture_id": null,
    "medium_id": null,
    "ptable_id": null,
    "root_pass": null,
    "puppet_ca_proxy_id": null,
    "use_image": null,
    "image_file": "",
    "ancestry": null,
    "vm_defaults": null,
    "subnet_id": null,
    "domain_id": null,
    "puppet_proxy_id": null,
    "title": "hostgroup2",
    "compute_profile_id": null,
    "realm_id": null,
    "grub_pass": "",
    "lookup_value_matcher": "hostgroup=hostgroup2",
    "hosts_count": 0
  }
}
